Development

The Studium website is built with Jekyll, a static site generator, and relies on key|value pairs to form relationships between authors, translators, and the content itself. To aid in development the site's key|value pairs are documented here.

contributors

The contributors collection manages the list of translators, editors, and writers whose work is published in Studium.

Key shortname Value firstname Value lastname
bassett Caleb Bassett
behnken Jacob Behnken
biebert Nathaniel Biebert
derme John Derme
foxen Benjamin Foxen
grundmeier Timothy Grundmeier
hunter Philip Hunter
hussman Andrew Hussman
jensen Aaron Jensen
koepke Michael Koepke
lahmann Kirk Lahmann
souk Souksamay Phetsanghane
strucely David Strucely
voss Aaron Voss
waldschmidt Daniel Waldschmidt
zarling Joshua Zarling

authors

The authors collection manages the list of original authors whose work has been translated in Studium publications.

Studium is published under the supervision of Martin Luther College, New Ulm, Minnesota.
